data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huo, Lizhi, Li, Wenjing, Chen, Xiaosheng, Ren, Shunxiang, Wang, Xingmin (2015): New species, new synonymies and a new record of the genus Cryptogonus Mulsant, 1850 (Coleoptera, Coccinellidae) from China. Deutsche Entomologische Zeitschrift 62 (2): 203-210, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5242, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/dez.62.5242
